adHeader: FREE- 1 Room painting with any interior/exterior paint job!
adDetails: No Kidding, FREE painting of an entire room (10x12 max) with the presentment of this Coupon. Please mention the coupon from Craigslist when calling. If you are ordering a complete interior job, I will discount the cost of the FREE room. Please mention this ad. Hi There! My name is Carl! I am a Building, House and Commercial Property painter with decades of experience. I do my absolute best to make you, the customer, happy. My work speaks for itself! I do exteriors and Interiors. Get your painting done before it gets really hot. Call me, Carl show contact info or email sirkibby18@yahoo .com Call me for a free estimate (In the San Francisco area). My work is fast, efficient and up to spec, as per your requirements. I can give you references on request. My customers are always extremely pleased. Call me, Carl show contact info I look forward to hearing from you.
